bioconda.name: bioconductor-genomicalignments
bioconda.summary: Representation and manipulation of short genomic alignments

biotools.summary: Provides efficient containers for storing and manipulating short genomic alignments (typically obtained by aligning short reads to a reference genome). This includes read counting, computing the coverage, junction detection, and working with the nucleotide content of the alignments.

bioschemas.name: GenomicAlignments
bioschemas.summary: Provides efficient containers for storing and manipulating short genomic alignments (typically obtained by aligning short reads to a reference genome). This includes read counting, computing the coverage, junction detection, and working with the nucleotide content of the alignments.
